thread.section_title: SaneBox Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SaneBox | sanebox.com
thread.title: Bob Winter

author: Bob Winter
title: Bob Winter
text:
I have been a SaneBox subscriber for a couple years and have found it to be an excellent application that has saved me quite a bit of time and helped me organize my life.
I use SaneBox with two email sources and both are treated equally and analyzed the same. Once in the last year I switched one of the email sources to a new email client and the transition was seamless.
I feel I'm just scratching the surface on how I can use this application to help me. Yesterday I dialed in to a webinar between SaneBox and TextExpander. I have also used TextExpander for a number of years and I was blown away by how these two applications can work together with email to save me time.
I was introduced to SaneBox through a couple respected podcasts and I'm very happy I first tried it out and then became a subscriber. I recommend anyone who wants to control their life and productivity and not let the constant stream of email take control, try out SaneBox.
Thanks,
Bob W.
